ViewObject.Name: ODHzPuiSearchRelFilterVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select al.meaning meaning, rt.forward_rel_code code from hz_code_assignments ca, hz_relationship_types rt, ar_lookups al where ca.owner_table_name = 'HZ_RELATIONSHIP_TYPES' and ca.class_code = :1 and ca.owner_table_id = rt.relationship_type_id and rt.subject_type = :2 and rt.role = al.lookup_code and al.lookup_type = 'HZ_RELATIONSHIP_ROLE' and 'GROUP' = :3 union all select al.meaning meaning, rt.forward_rel_code code from hz_relationship_types rt, ar_lookups al where al.lookup_type = 'HZ_RELATIONSHIP_ROLE' and rt.role = al.lookup_code and subject_type = :4 and 'NOGROUP' = :5 order by 1
